description:
This protocol describes the sequencing library preparation for the Tara Oceans expedition and is part of Viral to metazoan marine plankton nucleotide sequences from the Tara Oceans expedition. 
Figure 1: Overview of -omics analysis strategy applied on Tara Oceans samples.
